verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesy,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to those who <S%H5030>prophesy<s%> out of their own <S%H3820>heart,<s%> <S%H8085>Hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh:<s%>

Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to the <S%H5036>foolish<s%> <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> who <S%H1980>follow<s%> their own <S%H7307>spirit,<s%> and have seen <S%H7200>nothing!<s%>
<S%H3478>Israel,<s%> your <S%H5030>prophets<s%> have been like <S%H7776>foxes<s%> in the waste <S%H2723>places.<s%>

You have not gone <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H6556>gaps,<s%> neither built <S%H1443>up<s%> the <S%H1447>wall<s%> for the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> to <S%H5975>stand<s%> in the <S%H4421>battle<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

They have <S%H2372>seen<s%> <S%H7723>falsehood<s%> and <S%H3577>lying<s%> <S%H7081>divination,<s%> who <S%H5002>say,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H559>says;<s%> but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> has not <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3176>them:<s%> and they have made men to hope that the <S%H1697>word<s%> would be <S%H6965>confirmed.<s%>

<S%H2372>Haven't<s%> you seen a <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H4236>vision,<s%> and <S%H1696>haven't<s%> you spoken a <S%H7723>lying<s%> <S%H4738>divination,<s%> in that you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5002>says;<s%> but I have not <S%H559>spoken?<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> Because you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> <S%H7723>falsehood,<s%> and <S%H2372>seen<s%> <S%H3577>lies,<s%> <S%H5002>therefore,<s%> behold, I am against you, says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

My <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall be against the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> who <S%H2374>see<s%> <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H7080>visions,<s%> and who divine <S%H3577>lies:<s%> they shall not be in the <S%H5475>council<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> neither shall they be <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H3791>writing<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> neither shall they <S%H935>enter<s%> into the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H2937>Because,<s%> even because they have seduced my <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7965>Peace;<s%> and there is no <S%H7965>peace;<s%> and when one builds <S%H1129>up<s%> a <S%H2434>wall,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> they <S%H2902>plaster<s%> it with <S%H8602>whitewash:<s%>

<S%H559>tell<s%> those who <S%H2902>plaster<s%> it with <S%H8602>whitewash,<s%> that it shall <S%H5307>fall:<s%> there shall be an <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H1653>shower;<s%> and <S%H859>you,<s%> great <S%H417>hailstones,<s%> shall <S%H5307>fall;<s%> and a <S%H5591>stormy<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> shall tear <S%H1234>it.<s%>
<S%H7023>Behold,<s%> when the wall has <S%H5307>fallen,<s%> shall it not be <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H2915>you,<s%> Where is the plaster with which you have plastered <S%H2902>it?<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> I will even <S%H1234>tear<s%> it with a <S%H5591>stormy<s%> <S%H7307>wind<s%> in my <S%H2534>wrath;<s%> and there shall be an <S%H7857>overflowing<s%> <S%H1653>shower<s%> in my <S%H639>anger,<s%> and great <S%H417>hailstones<s%> in <S%H2534>wrath<s%> to consume <S%H3617>it.<s%>

So will I break <S%H2040>down<s%> the <S%H7023>wall<s%> that you have <S%H2902>plastered<s%> with <S%H8602>whitewash,<s%> and <S%H5060>bring<s%> it down to the <S%H776>ground,<s%> so that its <S%H3247>foundation<s%> shall be <S%H1540>uncovered;<s%> and it shall <S%H5307>fall,<s%> and you shall be <S%H3615>consumed<s%> in its <S%H8432>midst:<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Thus will I <S%H3615>accomplish<s%> my <S%H2534>wrath<s%> on the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> and on those who have <S%H2902>plastered<s%> it with <S%H8602>whitewash;<s%> and I will <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H7023>you,<s%> The wall is no <S%H2902>more,<s%> neither those who plastered it;

to <S%H5030>wit,<s%> the prophets of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> concerning <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> and who <S%H2374>see<s%> <S%H2377>visions<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> for <S%H7965>her,<s%> and there is no peace, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh.<s%>

<S%H1121>You,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> your <S%H6440>face<s%> against the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of your <S%H5971>people,<s%> who <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> out of their own <S%H3820>heart;<s%> and prophesy against <S%H5012>them,<s%>

and <S%H559>say,<s%> Thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H1945>Woe<s%> to the women who <S%H8609>sew<s%> <S%H3704>pillows<s%> on all <S%H679>elbows,<s%> and <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H4555>kerchiefs<s%> for the <S%H7218>head<s%> of persons of every <S%H6967>stature<s%> to <S%H6679>hunt<s%> <S%H5315>souls!<s%> Will you <S%H6679>hunt<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of my <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H2421>save<s%> <S%H5315>souls<s%> alive for <S%H2421>yourselves?<s%>

You have <S%H2490>profaned<s%> me among my <S%H5971>people<s%> for <S%H8168>handfuls<s%> of <S%H8184>barley<s%> and for <S%H6595>pieces<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> who should not <S%H4191>die,<s%> and to <S%H2421>save<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> <S%H2421>alive<s%> who should not <S%H2421>live,<s%> by your <S%H3576>lying<s%> to my <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H3577>lies.<s%>

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H136>Yahweh:<s%> <S%H3704>Behold,<s%> I am against your pillows, with which <S%H859>you<s%> there <S%H6679>hunt<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> to make them <S%H6524>fly,<s%> and I will <S%H7167>tear<s%> them from your <S%H2220>arms;<s%> and I will let the <S%H5315>souls<s%> <S%H7971>go,<s%> even the <S%H5315>souls<s%> whom you <S%H6679>hunt<s%> to make them <S%H6524>fly.<s%>

Your <S%H4555>kerchiefs<s%> also will I <S%H7167>tear,<s%> and <S%H5337>deliver<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> out of your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and they shall be no more in your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to be <S%H4686>hunted;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

Because with <S%H8267>lies<s%> you have <S%H3512>grieved<s%> the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous,<s%> whom I have not made <S%H3512>sad;<s%> and <S%H2388>strengthened<s%> the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H7451>wicked,<s%> that he should not <S%H7725>return<s%> from his <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> and be saved <S%H2421>alive:<s%>

Therefore you shall no more <S%H2372>see<s%> <S%H7723>false<s%> <S%H7080>visions,<s%> nor practice <S%H7081>divination.<s%> I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> my <S%H5971>people<s%> out of your <S%H3027>hand;<s%> and you shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>
